Header.title: World's first decentralized funding platform for film creators.
Header.paragraph: Invest in your favorite creators, get unique NFTs & earn passive royalty from their movie. Who will win? centralized media companies OR thousands of individual creators?

Tokenom.paragraph: Artists & Film cretors work hard to create their Art. Most of it get’s unotices due to bad marketing, And them not being able to stand up against Industry Moguls.
Tokenom.paragraph2: The solution is to create a Decentralized Community to support Artists get recognition for their work.
Tokenom.paragraph3: - By getting funded for their films.
Tokenom.paragraph4: - Get Traction & Marketing support from community.
Tokenom.paragraph5: - Break into an highly monopolistic Industry with power of community.

Roadmap.name: Q4 2021
Roadmap.text: Fund Raising, Onboarding Talented Artists, Building Alpha Platform, Platform Launch, Launch Most Interesting Bitcoin Documentary Every

Roadmap.name: Q1 2022
Roadmap.text: Plan & Systematically Launch A Media Season on “Bitcoin” Initial Genre Would be, Comedy to Attract More People to the Ecosystem, Launch 1 Episode Every Week, Promote Episodes With Influencers

Roadmap.name: Q2 2022
Roadmap.text: Complete Platform Launch, Implement Reward Features, Implement More Token Utility to Earn Royalties

Features.title: Auto Staking
Features.text: Invest in your favorite creators and earn passive rewards for life as royalty from their film sales.

Features.title: Deflationary
Features.text: 2% fees is added to each transaction and 1% fees is distributed equally to all token holders.

Features.title: Earn Royalties
Features.text: Earn life time royalties on your favorite creator calculated based on your weighted average. everyone wins together!

Features.title: Film Launchpad
Features.text: Our exclusive launchpad, allows creators to launch films & earn income by earning royalties for lifetime.
